sqlMap.select: SELECT RM,COV_NO,MEM_ID,COV_TITLE,COV_COM,COV_CONTENT,COV_PRICE, COV_JOB,COV_DATE,COV_YEAR,COV_SPEC,FILEFILENAME FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RM,COV_NO,MEM_ID,COV_TITLE,COV_COM,COV_CONTENT,COV_PRICE, COV_JOB,COV_DATE,COV_YEAR,COV_SPEC,FILEFILENAME FROM( SELECT COV_NO,MEM_ID,COV_TITLE,COV_COM,COV_CONTENT,COV_PRICE, COV_JOB,COV_DATE,COV_YEAR,COV_SPEC,FILEFILENAME FROM COVERLETTER ORDER BY COV_NO DESC)) WHERE RM BETWEEN #start# AND #end#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COVERLETTER SET COV_TITLE=#cov_title#,COV_COM=#cov_com#,COV_CONTENT=#cov_content#, COV_PRICE=#cov_price#, COV_JOB=#cov_job#, COV_YEAR=#cov_year#,COV_SPEC=#cov_spec#,FILEFILENAME=#fileFileName# WHERE COV_NO=#cov_no#
